thread.title: FEMA Wants Investors to Provide Shelter in the Next Storm

author: Nicole Friedman
title: FEMA Wants Investors to Provide Shelter in the Next Storm
text:
The Federal Emergency Management Agency plans to offload more of its flood-insurance risk to investors before the height of next hurricane season.
FEMA said Monday that it expects to issue its first catastrophe bond around July 1 to transfer some of the National Flood Insurance Programâ€™s risk exposure to the capital markets.
The NFIP, which...
